org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.tools

Class SolrIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.tools.SolrIndexer

  • public class SolrIndexer
extends Object
    Indexes products from the File Manager catalog to a Solr instance. Uses an associated config file, indexer.properties to specify how to perform the indexing. See indexer.properties in the src/main/resources directory for specific documentation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SolrIndexer.IndexerConfig
      This class manages the Indexer configuration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SolrIndexer(String solrUrl, String fmUrl)
      Constructor reads in the configuration and initiates the connection to the Solr instance.

      • indexMetFile

        public void indexMetFile(File file,
                         boolean delete)
                  throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        This method adds a single product extracted from a metadata file to the Solr index.
        Parameters:
        file - The file containing product metadata.
        delete - Flag indicating whether the entry should be deleted from the index.
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - When an error occurs communicating with the Solr server instance.

      • indexProductTypes

        public void indexProductTypes(boolean delete)
        This method indexes all product types retrieved from the File Manager to the Solr index.
        Parameters:
        delete - Flag indicating whether each product type retrieved from the File Manager should be deleted from the index.
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - When an error occurs communicating with the Solr server instance.

      • indexAll

        public void indexAll(boolean delete)
        This method indexes all products retrieved from the File Manager to the Solr index. Metadata from the product's associated ProductType is also included.
        Parameters:
        delete - Flag indicating whether each product retrieved from the File Manager should be deleted from the index.
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - When an error occurs communicating with the Solr server instance.

      • indexProduct

        public void indexProduct(String productId)
                  throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        This method adds a single product retrieved from the File Manager by its product identifier to the Solr index. Metadata from the ProductType is also included.
        Parameters:
        productId - The identifier of the product (CAS.ProductId).
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - When an error occurs communicating with the Solr server instance.

      • indexProductByName

        public void indexProductByName(String productName,
                               boolean delete)
                        throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        This method adds a single product retrieved from the File Manager by its product name to the Solr index. Metadata from the ProductType is also included.
        Parameters:
        productName - The identifier of the product (CAS.ProductId).
        delete - Flag indicating whether the entry should be deleted from the index.
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - When an error occurs communicating with the Solr server instance.
